name: Rawa Maida Paratha Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Rawa Maida Paratha Recipe: Flour 1/2 kg Semolina 1/2 cup Ghee 125 gm Salt 1/2 tsp Water to knead Ghee (for frying and stuffing) as required
instructions: In a bowl mix together flour, 125 gm ghee and salt. Knead with lukewarm water into dough. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Take out, make into 8 to 10 balls. Roll the balls into a saucer size, spread with ghee. Sprinkle 1 tbsp heaped semolina on top. Roll again in cone shape disc, again roll out into a paratha. Shallow fry in ghee. Serve with khasta Qeema.
